price: 63. Boye boyebi te ete ya sólo, oyo akozanga kotosa Allah na motindami waye, ya sólo ye akozalaka na móto mwa lifelo, libela kati na yango? Wana nde ekozala etumbu ya monene.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّهُۥ مَن يُحَادِدِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَأَنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدٗا فِيهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخِزۡيُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam yaʿlamū annahu man yuḥādidi al-laha warasūlahu fa-anna lahu nāra jahannama khālidan fīhā dhālika al-khiz'yu al-ʿaẓīmu
